thread.title: Of course Jeremy Corbyn hates the mainstream media – it's the perfect excuse for his failures
thread.title_full: Of course Jeremy Corbyn hates the mainstream media – it's the perfect excuse for his failures

author: Tom Harris
title: Of course Jeremy Corbyn hates the mainstream media – it's the perfect excuse for his failures
text:
T he next election will be the first social media election. Sound familiar? That’s because the prediction was made about the last two general elections too. And it wasn’t true then, either. The idea is based on an assumption that Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, etc, will become so well used and popular that a critical mass of voters will turn their backs on the traditional mainstream media (MSM) and instead rely on online sources for their information.
That, of course, is already happening to a degree: it’s why a depressingly high proportion of our citizens believe the US government were in on 9/11 and that Dr David Kelly was murdered by the state (ours or Iraq’s, depending on whether you prefer your eccentric conspiracy theories from a former government minister or not).
So we’re still a long way from the point at which online sources that aren’t part of the established media already can step...
